sources.name: ADLSGen2DS
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSGen2DS

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared ADLSGen2DS = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://adlsgen2alex.dfs.core.windows.net/container1/MoviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = ADLSGen2DS
in
  Source;
